description:
Give your wire cutters a break, these cable cutters provide clean cuts so frayed cable ends are a thing of the past.

  • Cross over jaws cut cleanly through cables and housing
  • Spring loaded grip for easy one handed use
  • Built-in crimper for cable end caps and housing ferrules
  • Super B housing reformer hole for reforming housing ends, making ferrule installation easy
name: MEC Cable Cutter Tool
